communitySolutions.learnFromOthersSoluti:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the 'Learn from others' solutions' section.
**UI Location**: Student Solution Summary → Community Solutions section (header)
**When Users See This**: Always visible on the solution summary page.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Learn from others' solutions"
communitySolutions.thisIsWhereWeWouldUsu:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text for tutorial solutions, indicating why community solutions are not shown.
**UI Location**: Student Solution Summary → Community Solutions section
**When Users See This**: When viewing a solution for a tutorial exercise.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "This is where we’d usually link you to other peoples’ solutions to the same exercise."
communitySolutions.exploreTheirApproache:
**Functional Purpose**: Encourages users to explore other solutions and learn.
**UI Location**: Student Solution Summary → Community Solutions section
**When Users See This**: When viewing a solution for a non-tutorial exercise.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Explore their approaches to learn new tips and tricks. Discover popular solutions to this exercise."
communitySolutions.viewCommunitySolution:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to navigate to community solutions.
**UI Location**: Student Solution Summary → Community Solutions section
**When Users See This**: When viewing a solution for a non-tutorial exercise.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "View community solutions"
mentoring.getMentoredByAHuman:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the 'Get mentored by a human' section.
**UI Location**: Student Solution Summary → Mentoring section (header)
**When Users See This**: Always visible on the solution summary page.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Get mentored by a human"
mentoring.youAlsoGetTheOpportunityToBeMe:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text for tutorial solutions, highlighting mentoring opportunity.
**UI Location**: Student Solution Summary → Mentoring section
**When Users See This**: When viewing a solution for a tutorial exercise.
**Technical Context**: The variable `trackTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "You also get the opportunity to be mentored by {trackTitle} experts."
mentoring.onAverageStudentsIterate:
**Functional Purpose**: Provides a statistic to encourage mentoring.
**UI Location**: Student Solution Summary → Mentoring section
**When Users See This**: When viewing a solution for a non-tutorial exercise.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "On average, students iterate a further 3.5 times when mentored on a solution."
mentoring.learnMore:
**Functional Purpose**: Link text to learn more about mentoring.
**UI Location**: Student Solution Summary → Mentoring section
**When Users See This**: When viewing a solution for a non-tutorial exercise.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Learn more"
